snippet: A gunman on a motorbike opened fire on three French paratroopers at a bank machine in southern France, killing two and critically wounding one of them on Thursday, officials said.
abstract: Gunman on a motorbike opens fire on three French paratroopers at a bank machine in southern France, killing two and critically wounding one of them.
lead_paragraph: A gunman on a motorbike opened fire on three French paratroopers at a bank machine in southern France, killing two and critically wounding one of them on Thursday, officials said.
